reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty, comfortable, and flattering, with one noting it's perfect for their pear-shaped body. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some say it hits at the knee, others find it runs short. The material quality and sizing also get mixed reviews, with some finding it sturdy while others say it feels cheap, and while some consider it true to size, others find it too small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!!
items.body: Love this dress!!! Well made. Super comfy. I’m 5’6 and dress was NOT too short (that was my biggest concern). Dress fit as described. Read more
items.author: gmorris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute !!
items.body: Both this dress in Navy. Size L (155-160# 5'5) This dress is adorable, the fit was perfect, plenty of room. Chest isn't overly revealing. Material is thin, however, it was fine for the price. I paired this with honey suede booties. Dress doubles, wore to casual retirement dinner & plan on wearing again to Thanksgiving dinner. If your on the cusp, make the purchase!! Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Flowy, and Versatile—Almost Perfect!
items.body: This dress is really lovely overall! The chiffon fabric is light and breathable, and the peasant sleeves and flowy shape give it such a soft, feminine look. I especially appreciated that it’s lined, so I didn’t have to worry about it being see-through. I wore it with heels to a recent work event and got several compliments! It felt polished yet comfortable, and I love that it can easily be dressed down with sandals for a more casual look. The fit was true to size, and the length was just right on me—not too short, even with heels. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the fabric wrinkles a little easily and could benefit from a quick steam or iron before wearing. But overall, it’s a great value and I’d definitely consider buying another color! Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute! Watch out for windy days
items.body: This review will be similar to another review I read here, because it was completely on point. Pros: I was pleasantly surprised how well this fit and how cute it was. I attended a wedding and received many compliments on the dress. I like how the sleeves cover my arms, but are sheer, so it's cool enough for spring/ fall. The cut was perfect to cover my chubby mom tummy, but still very classy and flattering. Material is very light and flowy. I feel very comfortable in this. Cons: The dress is pretty short. I'm only 5'4" (170lb). I got the size Large, and you can see it's still pretty short on me. Wearing this outside, the wind caught the fabric a few times and I def had several "Marilyn Monroe" moments... I'm sure I revealed more than anyone wanted to see that night. The snap on the cleavage area worked for me (I'm a 38C), but it was pretty cheap... felt if I moved the wrong way that it could bust open at any moment and also reveal more than I'd like. So maybe a safety pin would be more secure. Overall, I tried on like 30 dresses from Amazon... this was the clear winner, and I'd definitely wear this again! (Maybe on a non- windy day to an indoor event lol) Ps... don't mind the dusty mirror, but wanted to show how this dress looked. Read more
items.author: M Berky

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Cute but a very thin material and is tight on my arms so exchanging for larger size Read more
items.author: Elisa ewing

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Buy
items.body: This dress is exactly as described – a beautiful, flowy green floral dress that I am absolutely loving! While the elastic at the waist sits a little higher than depicted on the model, it’s still very comfortable to wear. A quick steam refresh would be wonderful, as it arrived vacuum-packed, but the fabric itself is incredibly soft and feels wonderful against the skin. I can easily dress this up with a stylish jacket for a more formal occasion, or keep it casual – it's a versatile and wonderful purchase, and I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress
items.body: Sizing was accurate. Pattern was cute and color as expected. Figure flattering style. Read more
items.author: Kim B

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Dress, But Snap Needs a Tweak!
items.body: I absolutely adore this dress! The fit is incredibly flattering, the fabric drapes beautifully, and it looks much more expensive than it is. I immediately felt comfortable and confident wearing it. My only minor critique is with the decorative snap on the front. While I appreciate that it's there to help prevent cleavage (especially for those with a larger bust), the snap itself is very shiny and stood out in an obnoxious way. I was able to easily remove it, and the dress is perfect now. If the snap were black or blended into the fabric better, it would be a non-issue. Overall, this is a beautiful piece I highly recommend—just be prepared to potentially remove or replace the front snap! Read more
items.author: Nicole weatherspoon

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Burgundy Floral, Green Paisley, Navy Floral, Black Floral, Red Paisley, Green Floral, Orange Floral, Light Apricot, Midnight Blue Floral, Hot Pink, Black, Black Ditsy, Dark Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
